short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pause and reflect before making a purchase.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop Smart, Save Money!
ThinkBeforeYouBuy extension helps people avoid impulse purchases by notifying people when it is effective the most. Just before the shopper reaches the payment portal, an extension triggers a 'Pause and Think' popup, giving the shopper 15 15-second window to thoughtfully reconsider your purchase and decide if it's an impulsive buy. This is the best extension for someone who is looking for tools to help them avoid impulse purchases and save money. 
For $2.99 per month with the ThinkBeforeYouBuy extension, you would be able to save a lot more simply by avoiding impulsive purchases.

We value your privacy. No shopping data is collected!
